content: The Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook is one of the many Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the rest of these items, once found, it can be equipped from the Equipment menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cuo_Jin-Yin_Belt_Hook.md', within the main section titled 'Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook'.
The content is as follows:
The Cuo Jin-Yin Belt Hook is one of the many Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the rest of these items, once found, it can be equipped from the Equipment menu.
